articles.description: Nathan Lyon wants a 5-0 whitewash of England as the first step to claiming the World Test Championship.
articles.content: Obviously, Ashes for me is the pinnacle, but Id love to be part of a Test championship final, whether thats at Lords or wherever it may be in the world, to really state our case for the number one te… [+2102 chars]

articles.content:
